posts.post_content:
I have the following SGC graded t206's for sale, these all have wonderful eye appeal and look nicer than the assigned grades:

T206 John McGraw finger in air Giants Piedmont 150 Subjects PSA 2mk SOLD :)
[IMG]http://i672.photobucket.com/albums/vv84/jabiloxi/t206anddiamondstars043.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Miller Huggins hands at mouth Reds  Piedmont 350 Subjects PSA 1.5 SOLD :)
[IMG]http://i672.photobucket.com/albums/vv84/jabiloxi/t206anddiamondstars042.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Iron Man McGinnity Newark Piedmont 350 Subjects PSA 2 SOLD :)
[IMG]http://i672.photobucket.com/albums/vv84/jabiloxi/t206anddiamondstars038.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Ed Cicotte Red Sox Sweet Caporal 150 Subjects SGC 40 SOLD :)
[IMG]http://i672.photobucket.com/albums/vv84/jabiloxi/t206anddiamondstars033.jpg[/IMG]

Again, all of these have tremendous eye appeal and probably deserve better grades.  Cases are all clean and I will send back pics on request.  First Email that says "I'll take it" or something along those lines gets it.  pm if interested.

Thanks.
Per earlier pm will take cicotte
